channel.title: Setting up my server, so others can get on
channel.description:
ok, so far i have
[code] -downloaded NO-IP -input [b][u]2[/u][/b] things (triplex.no-ip.org & triplex2.no-ip.info) -made a exeption in the firewall (NAME:triplex PORT:43594) -Marking the SMILEYS so they look like this [IMG]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/8951/blushgu0.png[/img] [/code]
ONLY hamachi works for me :( what do i do...please help

item.title: Setting up my server, so others can get on
item.dc:creator: @arlight1 arlight1
item.description:
@arlight1 wrote:

[quote=“skatelifemanager, post:1, topic:39063”]ok, so far i have

-downloaded NO-IP
-input [b][u]2[/u][/b] things (triplex.no-ip.org & triplex2.no-ip.info)
-made a exeption in the firewall (NAME:triplex PORT:43594)
-Marking the SMILEYS so they look like this [IMG]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/8951/blushgu0.png[/img]

ONLY hamachi works for me what do i do…please help[/quote]so u made an account 4 no-ip?if u did after that download the no-ip program and start it up and if ur still logged in wen u made an acc add a server type the server name and the .servegame or.no-ip etc. u choose after that u need 2 go on hamachi and make a network(e.g.c. nolagscape.servegam.com)and after that start up moparscape and put in the ip:)should work now if not read next post[br][size=1]Posted on: December 25, 2006, 11:23:55 PM[/size][hr][quote=“arlight1”][quote author=skatelifemanager link=topic=54961.msg681016#msg681016 date=1167028540]
ok, so far i have

-downloaded NO-IP
-input [b][u]2[/u][/b] things (triplex.no-ip.org & triplex2.no-ip.info)
-made a exeption in the firewall (NAME:triplex PORT:43594)
-Marking the SMILEYS so they look like this [IMG]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/8951/blushgu0.png[/img]

ONLY hamachi works for me what do i do…please help
[/quote]so u made an account 4 no-ip?if u did after that download the no-ip program and start it up and if ur still logged in wen u made an acc add a server type the server name and the .servegame or.no-ip etc. u choose after that u need 2 go on hamachi and make a network(e.g.c. nolagscape.servegam.com)and after that start up moparscape and put in the ip:)should work now if not read next post[/quote]this is continued on after my last post…after u made ur server on the no-ip website go 2 the no-ip program and right click on the white box in the middle and refresh the list ur server should come up and then it rlly should work if not then go to the section of tut posts and look 4 tutorials 2 make server because they’re more in-depth then my quik walkthrough:)

Read full topic
item.source: Setting up my server, so others can get on
